<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/api/v1/assets/export/"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Gets a ZIP file with all the Superset assets (databases, datasets, charts, dashboards, saved queries) as YAML files.

  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
